content: lion brand pattern # 70201a skill level easy + level 3 gauge 1 square = 14 x 14 in 35 5 x 35 3 cm vanna s choice® article #860 4 colors 2 balls each 8 balls total *purple olive rust antique rose* crochet hook - size k-10 5 6 5 mm work 9 motifs each in a different color sequence motifs are sewn together to create three strips which are then joined and finished with a crocheted border *lion brand notes * please note that this afghan is created with a technique that will not create precisely square pieces and is not meant to lay perfectly flat if you are experiencing cupping of your squares which tends to happen if you are crocheting more tightly work more loosely or switch to a larger hook published as a free lion brand flyer *lb #70201 crochet afghan squared* 6/07 c 2007 lion brand yarn company
